text: Health Service Division () is a Bangladesh government division under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare responsible for healthcare in Bangladesh. Secretary Asadul Islam is the head of the division. ==History== In the 1970s the ministry had two divisions but they were combined in 1985. Health Service Division was established on 16 March 2017 through the bifurcation of the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. ==References== Category:2017 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Government divisions of Bangladesh
title: Health Service Division
